meeting_request.purpose: Feeling discouraged and unsure if I can graduate
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Sara, a fourth-year History major. I’ve been doing really well in my classes, with a 3.8 GPA. But lately, I’ve been feeling more anxious about my grades and worried that I won’t be able to keep up. I’ve also been struggling with some of the more historical or theoretical aspects of my courses, and I’m finding it harder to connect with the material in a meaningful way. I’m feeling overwhelmed by everything I’ve already done, and not sure if I can keep going. I’m hoping to talk to someone about how to stay focused and improve my academic performance, but I’m not sure how to ask for help or what to say. I’m also interested in exploring some creative writing or digital media options as a way to shift my focus away from history and into something more contemporary or experimental.
